systeminfo
==========

Command Function
----------------

This command is used to display the resource usage of the current OS,
including tasks, semaphores, mutexes, queues, and timers.

Syntax
------

systeminfo

Parameter
---------

None

Usage
-----

None

Example
-------

Enter **systeminfo**.

Output
------

| **Figure 1** Usage of system resources
| |image1|

**Table 1** Output description
